author: Staff Reporter
text:
A seven-year-old girl drowned in a sump of a house that was under-construction house on Saturday evening.

The house was just a few yards from her house at V. V. Nagar in Kudiyuruppupalayam near Bahour.

The victim has been identified as Nishanthini daughter of Ramamurthy, an employee of a restaurant in Kirumambakkam. Nishanthini was studying class II in a private school in Kirumambakkam. The child was playing with her friends near the house under construction house (belonged to Vinodh Kumar in Kudiyuruppupalayam). Meanwhile, Vasuki became anxious when the child did not return home even after several hours.

A frantic search by the family led them to the house of Vinodh Kumar where Vasuki found Nishanthini’s footwear. They searched the house and found the child drowned in the sump, which was located near the staircase, at the entrance of the house.

Vasuki cried out for help and neighbours who rushed in, retrieved the body and took to a nearby hospital where doctors pronounced her brought dead.

On information the Bahour police sent the body to the Indira Gandhi Government Medical College and Hospital at Kathirgamam for post-mortem.

The Bahour police have registered a case under Section 174 Cr.P.C (suspicious death).

Police sources said Vinodh Kumar had recently conducted the house warming ceremony but they had left the sump uncovered.
title: Girl dies after falling into sump
